title: Trik film three
creator_credit: George Griffin and Eccentric Circle Cinema Workshop
brief_description: A film experiment which uses one of the oldest methods of simple animation. The artist draws a series of pictures of a simple set of actions in progression. These are then stacked in the hand and flipped through to form a moving image. Useful for film making classes. Without commentary.
